data.meta_description: Welcome to the Department of Mathematics.  Our mission is to preserve, expand, and disseminate mathematical knowledge.  Pursue a degree in the fields of Financial, Pure, Applied, Biomathematics, and Data Science.
data.text:
Financial Mathematics at Florida State University

The FSU Financial Mathematics graduate program offers studies leading to the MS and PhD degrees in Mathematics related to Finance. We invite applications from students with a strong mathematics background --see the Admissions page for how to apply, and explore the other links above to learn more about the program.
